Service Details: - Provides end of life services including mausoleum and lawn crypts for full-body entombment, niches for inurnment, a scattering garden for cremated remains, companion or family cremation burial plots, and family estates- Offers several options to remember loved ones, such as Adopt a Bench, Adopt a Tree, memorial walls, and Christmas holiday Trees of Memories
Hours: Cemetery Office Hours:  Mon-Fri: 8:00am - 4:00pm (closed from 12pm - 1pm for lunch)Cemetery Hours:  - Mar 16 - Oct 31: 7:00am - 8:00pm - Nov 1 - Mar 15: 7:00am - 5:00pm
Accessibility: Fully Accessible - accessible entrance to City Hall is located off Queensway
